thread.title: Matthew McConaughey debuts balding, tubby look on set of new film

author: Tyler White
title: Matthew McConaughey debuts balding, tubby look on set of new film
text:

Photo: DVT/Star Max, Getty Images NEW YORK, NY - OCTOBER 04: Actor Matthew McConaughey is seen on... Image 8 of 46 See which stars have drastically changed their look for a film role.
Photo: 2014 ChinaFotoPress See which stars have drastically changed their look for a film role. Image 9 of 46 Take a look at the actors and actresses who have undergone drastic transformations for a movie role:
Johnny Depp lost the facial hair and donned a bald cap for his role as aging mob boss James "Whitey" Bulger in the upcoming film 'Black Mass' which is currently filming.
Photo: 2014 ChinaFotoPress Take a look at the actors and actresses who have undergone drastic... Image 10 of 46 Johnny Depp as mob boss James "Whitey" Bulger in the upcoming 'Black Mass' film.
Photo: Patriot Pics/FAMEFLYNET PICTURES Johnny Depp as mob boss James "Whitey" Bulger in the upcoming... Image 11 of 46 Anne Hathaway recently said that she lost too much weight — 25 pounds — for her role as Fantine in "Les Miserables." She said, “I lost the first 10 (pounds) in three weeks through a detox and then I lost the subsequent 15 in 14 days by doing food deprivation and exercise, which I don’t recommend."
Photo: Jemal Countess, Getty Images Anne Hathaway recently said that she lost too much weight — 25... Image 12 of 46 Anne Hathaway in "Les Miserables."
Photo: Watchtower Films Anne Hathaway in "Les Miserables." Image 13 of 46 Actress Charlize Theron gained 30 pounds and wore prosthetic teeth for role as serial killer Aileen Wuornos in 2003's "Monster." She won an Oscar for the performance.
Photo: Jason Merritt, Getty Images Actress Charlize Theron gained 30 pounds and wore prosthetic teeth... Image 14 of 46 Charlize Theron in "Monster."
Photo: AP Charlize Theron in "Monster." Image 15 of 46 Christian Bale, who weighed around 185, lost over 60 pounds for his role in "The Machinist."
Photo: JOHANNES EISELE, AFP/Getty Images Christian Bale, who weighed around 185, lost over 60 pounds for his... Image 16 of 46 Here is Bale in "The Machinist."
Here is Bale in "The Machinist." Image 17 of 46 Bale then turned around and gained about 100 pounds immediately after for "Batman Begins."
Photo: Stephen Vaughan, AP Bale then turned around and gained about 100 pounds immediately... Image 18 of 46 Gerard Butler sculpted some serious abs — and pecs and lats and ... — for the movie "300" by doing grueling workouts for up to six hours a day.
Photo: Andreas Rentz, 2012 Getty Images Gerard Butler sculpted some serious abs — and pecs and lats and... Image 19 of 46 Gerard Butler in "300."
Photo: HO, REUTERS Gerard Butler in "300." Image 20 of 46 So, no, Cameron Diaz didn't put on an amazing amount of weight or anything, but the actress majorly de-glamourized herself for her part in Spike Jonze's "Being John Malkovich."
Photo: Stephen Lovekin, Getty Images So, no, Cameron Diaz didn't put on an amazing amount of weight or... Image 21 of 46 Cameron Diaz and her frizzy, mousy hair in "Being John Malkovich."
Photo: Universal Studios, Getty Images Cameron Diaz and her frizzy, mousy hair in "Being John Malkovich." Image 22 of 46 A relative unknown actress at the time, Hilary Swank transformed into Brandon Teena, a non-operative transgender young man who was beaten, raped and murdered, in the film "Boys Don't Cry." She won an Oscar.
Photo: Jamie McCarthy, Getty Images A relative unknown actress at the time, Hilary Swank transformed... Image 23 of 46 Hilary Swank in "Boys Don't Cry."
Photo: Fox Searchlight Pictures, SFC Hilary Swank in "Boys Don't Cry." Image 24 of 46 Renee Zellweger gained close to 30 pounds for her role as British singleton Bridget Jones in 2001's "Bridget Jones' Diary." She tells the Daily Mail, "It sounds like heaven," she said. "For two days it's bliss and then you're full, OK? And you can then indulge all your fantasies about over-eating. "Fantasies about non-stop chocolate consumption or your fantasies about ordering the pizza and the spaghetti and the garlic bread. "Then after a week your glucose levels are going crazy. You're up and down and all over the place. It doesn't feel good, and no one wants to hear that, but it's the truth."
Photo: Mike Coppola, 2011 Getty Images Renee Zellweger gained close to 30 pounds for her role as British... Image 25 of 46 Renee Zellweger in "Bridget Jones's Diary."
Photo: Miramax 2001 Renee Zellweger in "Bridget Jones's Diary." Image 26 of 46 For Tom Hanks' Oscar-nominated role in "Cast Away," the actor took time off after filming the first half of the film so he could lose 45 pounds and grow his hair out.
Photo: Stephen Lovekin, Getty Images For Tom Hanks' Oscar-nominated role in "Cast Away," the actor took... Image 27 of 46 "Cast Away" Tom Hanks.
Photo: 20th Century Fox, SFC "Cast Away" Tom Hanks. Image 28 of 46 A far cry from his pretty boy Jordan Catalano character on "My So-Called Life," actor/musician Jared Leto gained more than 65 pounds to play to John Lennon's killer Mark David Chapman in the 2007 film "Chapter 27." He gained the weight so quickly, he developed gout.
Photo: Michael Buckner, Getty Images For Fast Company A far cry from his pretty boy Jordan Catalano character on "My... Image 29 of 46 Jared Leto stars as John Lennon assassin Mark David Chapman in "Chapter 27."
Photo: JoJo Whilden, ASSOCIATED PRESS Jared Leto stars as John Lennon assassin Mark David Chapman in... Image 30 of 46 Matt Damon wasn't in Jason Bourne shape for "The Informant!" He gained 30 pounds for the role.
Photo: Jason Merritt, Getty Images Matt Damon wasn't in Jason Bourne shape for "The Informant!" He... Image 31 of 46 A plumper Matt Damon in "The Informant!"
Photo: Claudette Barius, AP A plumper Matt Damon in "The Informant!" Image 32 of 46 To star in Ridley Scott's 1997 movie "G.I. Jane," Demi Moore shaved her head and got seriously buff, thanks to intense NAVY Seal-inspired workouts.
Photo: ANDREA SESTI, ASSOCIATED PRESS To star in Ridley Scott's 1997 movie "G.I. Jane," Demi Moore shaved... Image 33 of 46 "G.I. Jane" Demi.
"G.I. Jane" Demi. Image 34 of 46 Rooney Mara transformed herself into "The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo"'s Lisbeth Sander by getting multiple piercings (including her nipple), shaving her eyebrows and losing a lot of weight.
Photo: Kevin Winter, Getty Images Rooney Mara transformed herself into "The Girl With the Dragon... Image 35 of 46 Rooney Mara in "The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo."
Photo: Baldur Bragason, Sony Pictures Rooney Mara in "The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo." Image 36 of 46 Felicity Huffman won a Golden Globe and was nominated for an Oscar for her portrayal of a pre-operative transsexual in 2005's "Transamerica."
Photo: Michael Buckner, Getty Images Felicity Huffman won a Golden Globe and was nominated for an Oscar... Image 37 of 46 Felicity Huffman in "Transamerica."
Photo: IFC Films, The Weinstein Company Felicity Huffman in "Transamerica." Image 38 of 46 Actress Glenn Close spent a good amount of time in the makeup chair in order to turn into Albert Nobbs, a 19th century Irish woman who lives as a man, in the movie of the same name.
Photo: Mike Coppola, Getty Images For DirecTV Actress Glenn Close spent a good amount of time in the makeup chair... Image 39 of 46 Glenn Close in "Albert Nobbs."
Photo: Patrick Redmond, Roadside Attractions Glenn Close in "Albert Nobbs." Image 40 of 46 Singer Mariah Carey is rarely seen sans full makeup, hair and glitter, but for her role in "Precious: Based on the Novel 'Push' by Sapphire," she was decidedly unglam, going without makeup, as well as getting undereye bags and a hint of a mustache.
Photo: Michael Buckner, Getty Images For BET Singer Mariah Carey is rarely seen sans full makeup, hair and... Image 41 of 46 Mariah Carey in "Precious: Based on the Novel 'Push' by Sapphire."
Photo: Anne Marie Fox, Lionsgate Mariah Carey in "Precious: Based on the Novel 'Push' by Sapphire." Image 42 of 46 For his role as neo-Nazi skinhead Derek Vinyard in 1998's "American History X," Edward Norton gained 30 pounds worth of muscle.
Photo: Spencer Platt, Getty Images For his role as neo-Nazi skinhead Derek Vinyard in 1998's "American... Image 43 of 46 Edward Norton in "American History X."
Photo: NewLine Edward Norton in "American History X." Image 44 of 46 Tom Cruise strapped on a fake belly and balding wig for his role as movie mogul Les Grossman in Ben Stiller's "Tropic Thunder."
Photo: DAN STEINBERG, ASSOCIATED PRESS Tom Cruise strapped on a fake belly and balding wig for his role as... Image 45 of 46 Tom Cruise in 2008's "Tropic Thunder."
Photo: DreamWorks Tom Cruise in 2008's "Tropic Thunder." Image 46 of 46 Matthew McConaughey debuts balding, tubby look on set of new film 1 / 46 Back to Gallery Oscar-winning actor Matthew McConaughey has played a true detective, a buff stripper and HIV-positive cowboy.
But now he’s playing a tubby, balding businessman in his latest film, “Gold,” which is set to hit theaters in 2016, according to People .
The 45-year-old actor can be seen donning a grey suit and some wacky ties with a cigarette in one hand and a suitcase in the other, but his physical appearance is what is so jarring.
RELATED: Sandra Bullock adopts second child, has boyfriend move in with her
He’s got a noticeable receding hairline, jagged teeth and a beer belly.
The film, “Gold,” has McConaughey playing a businessman who works alongside a geologist to find gold in an Indonesian jungle, according to People.
Click through the slideshow to see a collection of photos of actors and actresses who have gone through major transformations for movie roles.
twhite@mysa.com
